sentences.en: By contrast, on television, where he has been appearing more frequently, he acts with uncanny sangfroid.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 在电视上--现在他出镜越来越频繁 -- 他的行为却异乎寻常的冷静.

sentences.en: Few men possessed the necessary sangfroid for this kind of operation, but Fache seemed born for it.
sentences.cn: 很少有人拥有从事这项工作的所必需的沉着，但法希天生是干这个的料。

sentences.en: She had the strength and sangfroid of a woman in the prime of life.
sentences.cn: 她具有正值青春的少妇的力量和沉着.

sentences.en: The commander showed great sangfroid and acted without ever losing his composure.
sentences.cn: 船长表现得尤其从容镇定，行动中丝毫没有失去冷静。

sentences.en: This sangfroid could be tested by several threats.
sentences.cn: 这种泰然自若的姿态要经受多种威胁的考验.

sentences.en: With sangfroid the sanguinary man bangs his sanguine son against the hanger in the hangar.
sentences.cn: 残暴男子从容地把乐观的儿子往飞机库里的挂钩上猛撞.
